verses.name: Matthew 20:10
verses.text: But when the first came, they supposed that they should have received more; and they likewise received every man a penny.

verses.name: Matthew 20:11
verses.text: And when they had received it, they murmured against the goodman of the house,

verses.name: Matthew 20:12
verses.text: Saying, These last have wrought but one hour, and thou hast made them equal unto us, which have borne the burden and heat of the day.

verses.name: Matthew 20:13
verses.text: But he answered one of them, and said, Friend, I do thee no wrong: didst not thou agree with me for a penny?
